text: [ The following article contains spoilers for Sunday's series finale of Teen Wolf. Read at your own risk! ] It started with a bite and it ended with a pack. Teen Wolf concluded a six - year, 100 - episode run on Sunday with one of its most enjoyable episodes ever. Scott ( Tyler Posey ) and his pack faced off against Gerard Argent's ( Michael Hogan ) full army and their nightmares come to life, as they put the fear - mongering villain the Anuk - Ite in the ground for good. Defeating the Anuk - Ite was a lot easier said than done, though. Since the two - faced monster was able to reunite with its other half, no one in the pack could look it in the eye.
